changeSet.author: Daniele Faieta
changeSet.sql: GRANT SELECT,INSERT,UPDATE,DELETE ON A4GD_NUTS TO ${user.writer}; GRANT SELECT ON A4GD_NUTS TO ${user.reader};

update.where: SIGLA_PROVINCIA = 'MI'
SIGLA_PROVINCIA = 'BZ'
SIGLA_PROVINCIA = 'TN'
SIGLA_PROVINCIA = 'VR'
SIGLA_PROVINCIA = 'PD'
SIGLA_PROVINCIA = 'BO'
NUTS_1 = 'Northeast Italy' AND CODICE_1 = 'ITD' and SIGLA_PROVINCIA = 'BL'
NUTS_1 = 'Northeast Italy' AND CODICE_1 = 'ITD' and SIGLA_PROVINCIA = 'FC'
NUTS_1 = 'Northeast Italy' AND CODICE_1 = 'ITD' and SIGLA_PROVINCIA = 'FE'
NUTS_1 = 'Northeast Italy' AND CODICE_1 = 'ITD' and SIGLA_PROVINCIA = 'GO'
NUTS_1 = 'Northeast Italy' AND CODICE_1 = 'ITD' and SIGLA_PROVINCIA = 'MO'
NUTS_1 = 'Northeast Italy' AND CODICE_1 = 'ITD' and SIGLA_PROVINCIA = 'PC'
NUTS_1 = 'Northeast Italy' AND CODICE_1 = 'ITD' and SIGLA_PROVINCIA = 'PN'
NUTS_1 = 'Northeast Italy' AND CODICE_1 = 'ITD' and SIGLA_PROVINCIA = 'PR'
NUTS_1 = 'Northeast Italy' AND CODICE_1 = 'ITD' and SIGLA_PROVINCIA = 'RA'
NUTS_1 = 'Northeast Italy' AND CODICE_1 = 'ITD' and SIGLA_PROVINCIA = 'RE'
NUTS_1 = 'Northeast Italy' AND CODICE_1 = 'ITD' and SIGLA_PROVINCIA = 'RN'
NUTS_1 = 'Northeast Italy' AND CODICE_1 = 'ITD' and SIGLA_PROVINCIA = 'RO'
NUTS_1 = 'Northeast Italy' AND CODICE_1 = 'ITD' and SIGLA_PROVINCIA = 'TS'
NUTS_1 = 'Northeast Italy' AND CODICE_1 = 'ITD' and SIGLA_PROVINCIA = 'TV'
NUTS_1 = 'Northeast Italy' AND CODICE_1 = 'ITD' and SIGLA_PROVINCIA = 'UD'
NUTS_1 = 'Northeast Italy' AND CODICE_1 = 'ITD' and SIGLA_PROVINCIA = 'VE'
NUTS_1 = 'Northeast Italy' AND CODICE_1 = 'ITD' and SIGLA_PROVINCIA = 'VI'
